text: tere liye ache se likhna hai thoda jeevan mai shaanti aaye tuhje jaane nahi dene vaale hai kahi pe chaahe jitna bada lodu ho tu
author: Abhishek Singh Tindal

text: abbe likhte hai tere liye acha sa
author: Abhishek Singh Tindal

text: bhai thoda time kaafi kuch hai tere liye
author: Abhishek Singh Tindal

text:
Start karte hai likhna tu voh hai jiske liye mujhe first year ke inferno se start karni padh rahi hai water polo boy we played like rockers in the pool and jeet kar aaye. uss din ki energy i can feel it in my bones. match khatam small talk exchange and joh connect kiye matlab pata nahi tha ki tu vahi hai joh kota gaya tha Saharanpur boy. I was missing Saharanpur boys at that time they made my drop journey much bearable and fir tu aaya. I can't say this to anyone else but yeh cosmic connection tere Saath hua college mai I am not letting this go bhai. At this moment I need my gin to go further deep down on this memory lane. you have the purest heart I have met in my life apart from me haha this is one of those thousands of things we did in this place. Hall 5 se C block se CSE se voh classes jaana se voh courses nikaalna se voh assignment deadline ek room mai baithe dena. There are countless things bhai I can put it here but that won't suffice the bond that I have with you kyuki tu har lamhe mai saath raha hai is 4 saalk ke raaste mai. Tere first beer is with me lucknow mai bas nikal gaye trip pe apan yeh pyaar kam na hoga yeh vada raha.

first-year ki summers se ek saat rhena start kardiya tha i didn't knewI was making memories with this guy I was just there ki haan I know this guy completely in the whole campus and Whenever he says something bhai ki baat mai dum tha. First year se mere decision kaafi fucked up rahe hai but you were there to always point out and bring what's best in my interest. 

I want you to trip again because I somehow made it not good for you but I want you to experience that good vibe with me let's save it for another city trip. In these 4 years, I have listened to music with you netflix binge tere saath talked about existential crisis and the BT this world is so much more Bhai.

Let's talk about you bhai tuhje pata rhena chaiye tu sher hai out there build karte jaa it's in you second doubt shit sochna nahi hai abb. we are out here playground apna hai we have lot of plans now Joh hum char saal nahi kar paaye issi Zindagi mai pure karke jayenge. 

I know tere zindagi mai kuch lamhe aaise aaye the jaha pe tu mujhe dhund raha tha but mai tha nahi vaha uske liye dil se bhai maaf karde mujhe kyuki Phir hoyunga judaa Haan yeh vaada raha. A lot of success to you and I am here to celebrate it with you every time remember this no escape here Bhai.
Bhai love you <3
author: Abhishek Singh Tindal

text: kya bolu tere liye sab kam hai bhai
author: Abhishek Singh Tindal

text: didi aapke liye bhi likhte kuch acah sa rukiye zara
author: Abhishek Singh Tindal

text:
You must be dying to see this. Hey didi now I pen down about us, our story started with Antaragni and will go way further than the people I said goodbye on my last day in campus. If it wasn't for the pandemic we could have shared a lot of memories as co-head which I will miss now but nevertheless teaching you all the fundas and how we pull shows in Antaragni only we know that. After coming back for such a short time in campus and beete lamhein hamein jab bhi yaad aate hai tere saath bitaaye hum mushkara jaate hai. tuhje abhi bhi menu ko dekh kar order karna nahi aata (mama mio). Thank you so much for the view from GH matlab this will be remembered till the end and all credits goes to me. Your first experience of many stuffs is on me and I will take this lead I hope mere aankhe saath de xd..
pata nahi if I can say this about anyone else I wish I knew you before mere life easy rheti haha khush ho sakta hai tu abb but you know I saw many things in you and all the combination you have mere ko dede. In return you can have my powers.
I know your journey in campus now and I must say you did good kissi ki nahi sunni here and I wish you so much success and ofcourse I will be there to celebrate with all the energy khe diya toh khe diya didi.
author: Abhishek Singh Tindal

text: haha 10th se phele likh diya kya bol rahi thi tu..
author: Abhishek Singh Tindal
